1.0.name: wordpress/my-comment
1.0.description: In Wordpress default system there is no link to view users own comment. This plugin filter comment by login user. So the link My comment in back-end menu shows all comments that is commented by that user. For more information about the plugin please see: http://www.krishe.com/en/my-comment
